verses.verse: "You shall not bear <S%H5375><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> report; <S%H8088><s%> do not join <S%H7896><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> with a wicked <S%H7563><s%> man <S%H7563><s%> to be a malicious <S%H2555><s%> witness. <S%H5707><s%>

"You shall not follow <S%H1961><s%> <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> in doing evil, <S%H9567><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you testify <S%H6030><s%> in a dispute <S%H7379><s%> so as to turn <S%H5186><s%> aside <S%H5186><s%> after <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> in order to pervert <S%H5186><s%> [justice;]
nor <S%H3808><s%> shall you be partial <S%H1921><s%> to a poor <S%H1800><s%> man <S%H1800><s%> in his dispute. <S%H7379><s%>

"If <S%H3588><s%> you meet <S%H6293><s%> your enemy's ox <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his donkey <S%H2543><s%> wandering <S%H8582><s%> away, <S%H8582><s%> you shall surely <S%H7725><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> it to him.

"If <S%H3588><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> the donkey <S%H2543><s%> of one who hates <S%H8130><s%> you lying <S%H7257><s%> [helpless] under <S%H8478><s%> its load, <S%H4853><s%> you shall refrain <S%H2308><s%> from leaving <S%H5800><s%> it to him, you shall surely <S%H5800><s%> release <S%H5800><s%> [it] with him.
"You shall not pervert <S%H5186><s%> the justice <S%H4941><s%> [due] to your needy <S%H34><s%> [brother] in his dispute. <S%H7379><s%>

"Keep <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from a false <S%H8267><s%> charge, <S%H1697><s%> and do not kill <S%H2026><s%> the innocent <S%H9345><s%> or the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> for I will not acquit <S%H6663><s%> the guilty. <S%H7563><s%>

"And you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a bribe, <S%H7810><s%> for a bribe <S%H7810><s%> blinds <S%H5786><s%> the clear-sighted and subverts <S%H5557><s%> the cause <S%H1697><s%> of the just. <S%H6662><s%>

"And you shall not oppress <S%H3905><s%> a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> since you yourselves <S%H9043><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> the feelings <S%H5315><s%> of a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> for you [also] were strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
"And you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your land <S%H776><s%> for six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> and gather <S%H622><s%> in its yield, <S%H8393><s%>

but [on] the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year <S%H7637><s%> you shall let <S%H8058><s%> it rest <S%H8058><s%> and lie <S%H5203><s%> fallow, <S%H5203><s%> so that the needy <S%H34><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> may eat; <S%H398><s%> and whatever they leave <S%H3499><s%> the beast <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> may eat. <S%H398><s%> You are to do <S%H6213><s%> the same <S%H3651><s%> with your vineyard <S%H3754><s%> [and] your olive <S%H2132><s%> grove. <S%H2132><s%>

"Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you are to do <S%H6213><s%> your work, <S%H4639><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall cease <S%H7673><s%> [from labor] in order <S%H4616><s%> that your ox <S%H7794><s%> and your donkey <S%H2543><s%> may rest, <S%H5117><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of your female <S%H519><s%> slave, <S%H519><s%> as well as your stranger, <S%H1616><s%> may refresh <S%H5314><s%> themselves.

"Now concerning everything <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have said <S%H559><s%> to you, be on your guard; <S%H8104><s%> and do not mention <S%H2142><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> let [them] be heard <S%H8085><s%> from your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
"Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H7272><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> you shall celebrate <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2287><s%> to Me.

"You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of Unleavened <S%H4682><s%> Bread; <S%H4682><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you are to eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H4682><s%> as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, at the appointed <S%H4150><s%> time <S%H4150><s%> in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib, <S%H24><s%> for in it you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> And none <S%H3808><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Me empty-handed.

"Also [you shall observe] the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of the Harvest <S%H7105><s%> [of] the first <S%H1061><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your labors <S%H4639><s%> [from] what <S%H834><s%> you sow <S%H2232><s%> in the field; <S%H7704><s%> also the Feast <S%H2282><s%> of the Ingathering <S%H614><s%> at the end <S%H3318><s%> of the year <S%H8141><s%> when you gather <S%H622><s%> in [the fruit of] your labors <S%H4639><s%> from the field. <S%H7704><s%>
"Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> a year <S%H8141><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

"You shall not offer <S%H2076><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of My sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread; <S%H2557><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> is the fat <S%H2459><s%> of My feast <S%H2282><s%> to remain <S%H3885><s%> overnight <S%H3885><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> morning. <S%H1242><s%>

"You shall bring <S%H935><s%> the choice <S%H7225><s%> first <S%H1061><s%> fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your soil <S%H127><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You are not to boil <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in the milk <S%H2461><s%> of its mother. <S%H517><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to guard <S%H8104><s%> you along the way, <S%H1870><s%> and to bring <S%H935><s%> you into the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have prepared. <S%H3559><s%>

"Be on your guard <S%H8104><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice; <S%H6963><s%> do not be rebellious <S%H4784><s%> toward him, for he will not pardon <S%H5375><s%> your transgression, <S%H6588><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> My name <S%H8034><s%> is in him.

"But if <S%H518><s%> you will truly <S%H8085><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I say, <S%H1696><s%> then I will be an enemy <S%H340><s%> to your enemies <S%H340><s%> and an adversary <S%H9475><s%> to your adversaries. <S%H6887><s%>

"For My angel <S%H4397><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and bring <S%H935><s%> you in to [the land of] the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the Hivites <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites; <S%H2983><s%> and I will completely <S%H3582><s%> destroy <S%H3582><s%> them.

"You shall not worship <S%H7812><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them, nor <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> according to their deeds; <S%H4639><s%> but you shall utterly <S%H2040><s%> overthrow <S%H2040><s%> them, and break <S%H7665><s%> their [sacred] pillars <S%H4676><s%> in pieces. <S%H7665><s%>

"But you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and He will bless <S%H1288><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> and your water; <S%H4325><s%> and I will remove <S%H5493><s%> sickness <S%H9258><s%> from your midst. <S%H7130><s%>
"There shall be no <S%H3808><s%> one miscarrying <S%H7921><s%> or barren <S%H6135><s%> in your land; <S%H776><s%> I will fulfill <S%H4390><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days. <S%H3117><s%>

"I will send <S%H7971><s%> My terror <S%H367><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you, and throw <S%H2000><s%> into confusion <S%H2000><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> among whom <S%H834><s%> you come, <S%H935><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H340><s%> turn <S%H5414><s%> [their] backs <S%H6203><s%> to you.

"And I will send <S%H7971><s%> hornets <S%H6880><s%> ahead <S%H6440><s%> of you, that they may drive <S%H1644><s%> out the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

"I will not drive <S%H1644><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> you in a single <S%H259><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> that the land <S%H776><s%> may not become <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and the beasts <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> become <S%H7231><s%> too <S%H5921><s%> numerous <S%H7231><s%> for you.

"I will drive <S%H1644><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> you little <S%H4592><s%> by little, <S%H4592><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> you become <S%H6509><s%> fruitful <S%H6509><s%> and take <S%H5157><s%> possession <S%H5157><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

"And I will fix <S%H7896><s%> your boundary <S%H1366><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to the River <S%H5104><s%> [Euphrates;] for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and you will drive <S%H1644><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> you.
"You shall make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them or with their gods. <S%H430><s%>

"They shall not live <S%H3427><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they make you sin <S%H2398><s%> against Me; for [if] you serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> it will surely <S%H3588><s%> be a snare <S%H4170><s%> to you."
